text: We Got This is the debut album from the New Orleans rap group, Chopper City Boyz, led by rapper B.G.. It was released on February 27, 2007. The first single off the album is "Make 'Em Mad", produced by David Banner. The album debuted at #21 on the Billboard 200, selling 27,000 copies in its first week,Jonathan Cohen, "Daughtry Flip-Flops With Jones, Reclaims No. 1", Billboard.com, March 7, 2007. which was also good for #1 on the Independent Albums chart.Billboard.com - Charts - Albums - Independent Albums ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" ! # !! width="250" | Title |- | 1. || "Intro" (feat.
